pages.text: Rituals come in a variety of tiers. The higher the tier of ritual, the more $(l:rituals/standing_stones)standing stones or ritual pillars$() are required.$(br2)Lower-tier rituals are more likely to be portable, while higher-tier rituals require planning and space.

pages.title: Simple Rituals
pages.text: These rituals do not require any additional standing stones or pillars and are thus quite portable.$(li)$(l:rituals/ritual_grove_supplication)Grove Supplication$()$(li)$(l:rituals/ritual_overgrowth)Overgrowth$()$(li)$(l:rituals/ritual_flower_growth)Flower Growth$()

pages.title: Tier I
pages.text: These rituals require a single addition, such as a $(l:rituals/standing_stones)standing stone or pillar$() or an $(l:apparatus/catalyst_plate)catalyst plate$(), but still remain relatively portable.$(li)$(l:rituals/ritual_transmutation)Transmutation$()$(li)$(l:rituals/ritual_frost_lands)Frost Lands$()$(li)$(l:rituals/ritual_gathering)Gathering$()$(li)$(l:rituals/ritual_summon_creatures)Summon Creatures$()$(li)$(l:rituals/ritual_wildroot_growth)Wildroot Growth$()

pages.title: Tier II
pages.text: These rituals require two additions of standing stones or pillars, but are still considered moderately portable.$(br2)$(li)$(l:rituals/ritual_healing_aura)Healing Aura$()$(li)$(l:rituals/ritual_germination)Germination$()$(li)$(l:rituals/ritual_heavy_storms)Heavy Storms$()$(li)$(l:rituals/ritual_spreading_forest)Spreading Forest$()

pages.title: Tier III
pages.text: These rituals require three standing stones or pillars and are generally considered stationary rituals.$(li)$(l:rituals/ritual_animal_harvest)Ritual Harvest$()$(li)$(l:rituals/ritual_divine_protection)Divine Protection$()$(li)$(l:rituals/ritual_windwall)Windwall$()$(li)$(l:rituals/ritual_purity)Purity$()

pages.title: Tier IV
pages.text: These are stationary rituals which significantly affect the area around them and require four (or more) standing stones or pillars. While they can be set up in advance, they require planning and forethought.$(li)$(l:rituals/ritual_fire_storm)Fire Storm$()$(li)$(l:rituals/ritual_warding_protection)Warding Protection$()
